application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted details of enhanced sound insulation value of at least 10dB above the minimum Building Regulations value for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating bedrooms from communal staircases and lifts in pursuant to condition 9 of planning permission 224188PANDF dated 24/11/2022, are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with Policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policies 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D6 & D14 of the London Plan (2021), Ealing SPG10 and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Details of enhanced sound insulation value of at least 10dB above the minimum Building Regulations value for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating bedrooms from communal staircases and lifts in pursuant to condition 9 of planning permission 224188PANDF dated 24/11/2022 for: Construction of additional storey extension to accommodate 9no. self-contained residential units, of which 8 are one bed and one is two bed; provision of associated cycle storage, refuse  and recycling storage  (Prior Approval Application, under Part 20, Class A)
